tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She was very considerate and explained everything very clearly, prior to the treatment, while sh treated my wife. She was very warm and friendly, right through the recovery process and treatment. Very professional and caring.

Doctor was extremely rude. I went to see her to get a second opinion on my cycle issues after removal of cervical polyps. I was already bleeding a lot and when I denied penetrative examination, she scolded me a lot and called me drama as I was stepping out. *** ***** ***** ** ** **** ****** ** **** **** 
Not visiting her again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very bad experience, very rude to patients and staff. Not ready to listen to patients or explains anything. When we ask something, she either shouts or gives sarcastic replies. Suggests all sorts of tests and treatments *** *** ***** ** *** ****** *** ** **** *** **** ******* ****** ****** *** ***** *** *********** *** * ****** **** ********** **** *** ***** ******* ** ******* ******** **** **** ****** *** ****

**** ********* ******* ******* **** ******* Always scolds patients and nursing staff.. I have very bitter experience with this doctor. If any issues during pregannacy time..  We cannot reach her.. Junior doctors will not give any medicine .. Suggest to meet the doctor after 2 days. After  delivery she never came to check the patient and baby .. Only junior doctors will come..
Dr manjula is very impatient she don't listen to patient at all am really not happy with her treatment.. Bad experience will  never recommend Dr manjula

My experience with her was a complete disappointment and I feel bad and sad for myself for being so gullible, despite being a senior citizen *** ****** ***** **** **** ***** **** ******* *** ** *****  How could I?

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was bad, did not tell anything just recommended multiple tests. Not ready to answer any question. Had to wait so long for nothing.
